title: Most valuable sport athlete brands worldwide 2017
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 37.2 is found at Player Roger Federer and the minimum is found at Stephen Curry where Player is 13.4.
There is a difference of 23.8 between the maximum Player Roger Federer and minimum Player Stephen Curry.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Player, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Player on the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 37.2 is found at Player Roger Federer and the minimum is found at Stephen Curry where Player is 13.4.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 37.2 is found at Player Roger Federer and the minimum is found at Stephen Curry where Player is 13.4.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Players.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Player Roger Federer and lowest at Player Stephen Curry.
The second highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Player LeBron James.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Player is 23.8.
The Player Roger Federer has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars, followed by LeBron James, and Usain Bolt. Down to the Player Stephen Curry which is the lowest.
The highest value 37.2 at Roger Federer is almost 1.77 times larger than the average value 21.03.
